front.title: IPv6 well known address for a 6to4 router

abstract.t: A 6to4 [1] domain is derived from a single IPv4 address of a border6to4 router. Although it is possible to have several 6to4 exit routerfor outbound traffic, there can only be one 6to4 router for inboundtraffic. This router is called the 6to4 designated router.
